name: Tim Kobe
biography: Designer, architect. Studied environmental design at Art Center College of Design, Pasadena, and graduated in 1982. Worked in Los Angeles for Herb Rosenthal at American Broadcasting Company, and in New York with Murray Gelberg. 1982 began working at The Burdick Group in San Francisco. 1987 became partner at West Office Design Associates. Founded own firm Kobeou Associates in 1989, which later became Eight, Inc. Firm focuses on architecture, design and planning, and has offices in San Francisco and Honululu.
